args.natural_language_statement:
Suppose a topology on the set Y is given as the final topology from functions f_i : X_i â†’ Y where i runs through an index set I. Prove that Y is Hausdorff if and only if the function P : X â†’ Y is injective for some topological space X and function P : X â†’ Y which includes all the functions f_i.

Translate this into Lean4. Use Mathlib import at the top and end the Lean statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

variable {I : Type*}
variable {Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace Y]
variable (X : I â†’ Type*) [âˆ€ i, TopologicalSpace (X i)]

variable (f : âˆ€ i, X i â†’ Y)

/-- Let Y carry the final topology with respect to the family `f : âˆ€ i, X i â†’ Y`.
    Let `P : Sigma X â†’ Y` be the canonical map from the disjoint union.
    Then Y is Hausdorff (T2) iff `P` is injective. -/
lemma final_topology_hausdorff_iff_injective (h_final : TopologicalSpace.IsFinal f) :
  T2Space Y â†” Function.Injective (fun x : Sigma fun i => X i => f x.1 x.2) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {I : Type _}
variable {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y]
variable (X : I â†’ Type _) [âˆ€ i, TopologicalSpace (X i)]

variable (f : âˆ€ i, X i â†’ Y)

def P (s : Sigma fun i => X i) : Y := f s.1 s.2

/-- Let Y carry the final topology with respect to the family `f : âˆ€ i, X i â†’ Y`.
    Let `P : Sigma X â†’ Y` be the canonical map from the disjoint union.
    Then Y is Hausdorff (T2) iff `P` is injective. -/
lemma final_topology_hausdorff_iff_injective (h_final : TopologicalSpace.IsFinal f) :
  T2Space Y â†” Function.Injective (P X f) := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {I : Type _}
variable {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y]
variable (X : I â†’ Type _) [âˆ€ i, TopologicalSpace (X i)]

variable (f : âˆ€ i, X i â†’ Y)

def P (s : Sigma fun i => X i) : Y := f s.1 s.2

/-- Let Y carry the final topology with respect to the family `f : âˆ€ i, X i â†’ Y`.
    Let `P : Sigma X â†’ Y` be the canonical map from the disjoint union.
    Then Y is Hausdorff (T2) iff `P` is injective. -/
lemma final_topology_hausdorff_iff_injective (h_final : Prop) :
  T2Space Y â†” Function.Injective (P X f) := by sorry
